title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Airbus A320 - Copenhagen to Basle hyperlapse
description:
In this video I will fly from Copenhagen to Basle. Landing is not the way I wanted to perform a landing after one additional bump I landed successfully. This video is a hyperlapse which means the video which normally was approximately 2 hours has been shorted to approximately 6 minutes. The audio of the game is removed completely and as a replacement music has been added.

The software I used to create the hyperlapse is Microsoft Hyperlapse Pro. More information about the tool can be found on the site below:

https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/product/computational-photography-applications/microsoft-hyperlapse-pro/
